title: MUL2010 - Experiencing Music
content: Analyzes contemporary music genres from different eras through a global lense.

title: ENY1001 - Bugs & People
content: Explores the development and interactions of bugs throughout history in the world.

title: PSY4956 - Mental & Social Isolation in Japan
content: Explores the social phenomenon and history of Hikikomori.

content: Discusses the fundamentals of neuroscience from a biological standpoint.

title: CIS4956 - Information & Society
content: Explores the social impact of information and technology on society.

title: CAI4101 - Fundamentals of AI
content: Introduces AI through applied machine learning techniques.

title: PSY4956 - Health Psychology
content: The principle concepts of health psychology and its research basis.

content: Introduces the study of psychology and its research basis.
